Hierarch Kekropus:
Ah, you. I have been expecting you. So you are unsatisfied with your present position? That is understandable. As you are, you cannot reach your full potential as a Kamael. Now, however, you will be able to access the power in you that, as mentioned in the "Forgotten History," was sealed by the lady in the blue dress...
"Forgotten History? Sealed? Please tell me the story in more detail."
